conversations.body_text: ID 号为 7601 和 7825 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单7601  
      主题: Order# SSN4102  
      描述:  Hello I just wanted to reach out to see when my order would be shipping as some time has passed since I ordered my pedals.  Thank you kindly

合并来自工单7825  
      主题: order#SSN4102  
      描述:  hello  i am getting concerned about my order and how its not been fulfilled yet. #SSN4102
 
   
 thank you kindly

Hi Tk Hacker,  We apologize for the shortage during the Black Friday peak season due to limited stock in our US warehouse. I have confirmed with our operations team that a batch of goods has been shipped to the US warehouse via air freight. We will arrange your shipment as soon as possible.

thank you so much for the update I was just getting a bit worried completely understand! 

>
